description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Pasig, Philippines. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Central Manila Stay in Pasig City with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Amongst grand skyscrapers and memories of Spanish architecture sits the Holiday Inn Manila Galleria, an IHG Hotel. Be romanced by the famous Manila sunset with a rooftop cocktail in the nightlife district of Poblacion, a hive of after-dark fun. Hit all the tourist spots in a colourful Jeepney and tour the historic ‘Walled City’ of Intramuros, or live like a local and eat your way down the high street. After endless exploration, cool off with a dip in the hotel’s outdoor pool.

seo.title: Hotel a Pasig - Philippines Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Pasig, Philippines con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
